meaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> with <radical>direction</radical> will have things <kanji>obstruct</kanji> her path. It's a sad fact that it's still a man's world out there!
readingMnemonic: This woman is truly magnificent. Some compare her to a <reading>bow</reading>ling (ぼう) ball, because of how she knocks down the obstructions in her path like bowling pins.
